title: Go Quiz (Harvested)

questions.question: When should you use Documentation?
options: An alternative to Documentation with additional configuration
A different approach to Documentation
Documentation Effective Go Effective Go Introduction Go is a new language
A component of Documentation with additional configuration

questions.question: Which approach is best for Effective?
options:

A component of Effective with additional configuration

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of Java?
options: A component of Java with additional configuration
An alternative to Java with additional configuration
A different approach to Java with additional configuration

A straightforward translation of a C++ or Java program into Go
is unlikely to produce a satisfactory result—Java programs
are written in Java, not Go
questions.explanation:
A straightforward translation of a C++ or Java program into Go
is unlikely to produce a satisfactory result—Java programs
are written in Java, not Go
